page.title: 16INDUSTRY 2 MONK
page.content: The building and civil engineering firm now known as Monk has its roots in Padgate.It began as a family firm in 1920 and has grown steadily since then.The Head Office is still here in Green Lane, but there is a series of regional offices throughout England, Scotland and Wales.The most recent figures supplied to us by the company show that the numbers of employees involved in building and civil engineering work are:_ site operatives ___ 1,170 office and supervisory staff __ 612 The firm has been involved locally in the town centre Golden Square shopping project, and the mechanically operated storage complex in Winwick Road for Fiat.
